name: TheSecretGame2
description: Explore the mysteries of TheSecretGame2. You are not alone and she is crying.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core Duo E6600 @ 2.4GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel 4400, GeForce GT 8800, AMD Radeon HD 4650 DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 6 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card
